metaData.label: APAC Prospects
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Description contains no AND CampaignMember:Common:Marketing_Interest__c contains Promotions AND ( CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Teacher/Educator OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Literacy OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of ICT OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Support OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Principal OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head Teacher OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Other )
